question: Which S1P receptors does fingolimod bind to?
ideal_answer: Pharmacologically, fingolimod has been characterized as a non-selective agonist of all of the S1P receptors (S1PR), with the exception of S1P2.

snippets.text: harmacologically, fingolimod was characterized as a non-selective agonist of all of the S1P receptors (S1PR), with the exception of S1P2, and in addition, as a selective S1P1 functional antagonist by induction of irreversible S1P1 internalization and degradation.
